guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
Throw Goblin Eggs that you get from killing Goblins
or opening chests in the Crystal Hollows
in the Dwarven Mines and kill what spawns from it.
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features to make this easier.
Use /warp trapper to get back to Trevor whenever you want
Do your daily experiments in the Experimentation Table,
always do the highest tier you can.
Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.
Talk to Jamie in The Hub and
claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right Click it to gain temporarily +100 Speed.
Optimal tool:
Advanced Gardening Hoe (25 copper)
Make a full plot of carrots (7896 needed)
in The Garden (SkyBlock Level 5)
Get the carrots to plant from The Barn
or from the cave under the mountain in The Hub.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5).
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow (-309 92 -209)
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to
get progress towards the Lucky Looter
and Enderman Slayer Community Goal.
Go to The End to mine Ender Nodes and
kill Nest Mites for Enchanted End Stone.
You need to be Combat Level 12 to go there.
Kill Goblins in the Goblin Burrows (-100 163 150)
while an event is going on.
You need Mining Level 12 to visit the required island.
Start an Entrance floor and play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
the classes abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer.
You only need to get the last hit
on it to count, so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 to join a Dungeon.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Dark Thicket (-353 103 -23)
in The Park (/warp park).
Place as many minions as you can
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Buy Chainmail Armor from Iron Forger
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces including equipment)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom and Cactus Armor
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste and Starlight Armor from Rosetta
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on owocato's, xMeru's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Do your daily commissions to unlock the Crystal Hollows
at Heart of the Mountain III (do your daily commissions
for 3 days). Find Bal by asking in chat
or using Wishing Compasses.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress.
You can visit all Islands by using the warp command.
The Hub (/hub), Spider's Den (/warp spider), The End (/warp end),
Gold Mine (/warp gold), Deep Caverns (/warp deep),
Farming Isles (/warp barn & /warp desert)
Remember that some of them require certain skill levels to enter.
List of more than 22 talismans:
Buy all 6 Talismans for 26k from the Adventurer in The Hub
Collection Talismans:
Night Vision Charm, Farming Talisman, Vaccine Talisman,
Gravity Talisman,Talisman of Coins, Magnetic Talisman,
Emerald Ring, Wood Affinity Talisman, Speed Talisman,
Potion Affinity Talisman
Other:
Archaeologists Compass, Shiny Yellow Rock, King Talisman,
Campfire Initiate Badge, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman,
Red Claw Talisman, Candy Talisman, Frozen Chicken,
New Year Cake Bag, Glacial Talisman (Frozen Treasure).
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner, he needs 1920 Redstone in total.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Lumberjack's or Moil
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
You will most likely get this while
going for Dark Oak Wood Collector.
Mine emeralds in the Dwarven Mines minecarts above the Bank.
Requires 32 Enchanted Emeralds and Emerald Collection 5 to craft.
Open chests in the Crystal Hollows (Heart of the Mountain III),
do commissions in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.
Get Enchanting Level 10 and play
the first tier in the Experimentation Table.
Mine Ender Nodes in The End until you get one.
It has a 1.31% chance to drop from the Obsidian Nodes.
You need Combat Level 12 to get there.
